NAME: Bloodstealer
DESCRIPTION: Drain health from your enemy's blood.

NAME: Fortify
DESCRIPTION: Fortify yourself and raise your defense.

NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of wind damage to an enemy. Increase your attack.

NAME: Intimidate
DESCRIPTION: Intimidate the enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Forest Blessing
DESCRIPTION: Heal yourself and raise your defenses.

NAME: Hyper Beam
DESCRIPTION: Deal a moderate amount of magic light damage to an enemy.

NAME: Berserk
DESCRIPTION: Enter an enraged state and raise both your attack and physical defense.

NAME: Dragonslayer Slash
DESCRIPTION: Deal moderate physical damage to an enemy.

NAME: Cursed Light
DESCRIPTION: Deal some light damage and reduce the enemy's magic defense.

NAME: Dark Restoration
DESCRIPTION: Restore some health but decrease your physical defense.

NAME: Ice Blades
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical ice damage and increase your attack.

NAME: Devour
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical dark damage and heal yourself an amount based on the damage dealt. Raises your attack.

NAME: To Arms!
DESCRIPTION: Increase your attack and raise a shield for 20% of your max health.

NAME: Abyssal Blade
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical and magical dark damage to an enemy. Lowers their defense.

NAME: Life Syphon
DESCRIPTION: Steal some HP dealing some dark magical damage and buff your magical attack.

NAME: Frost Armor
DESCRIPTION: Raise your physical defense and get a shield for 15% of your max health.

NAME: Fire Nova
DESCRIPTION: Deal some fire damage and lower the enemy's defense.

NAME: Necromantic Regeneration
DESCRIPTION: Regenerate some health and increase your magical defense. Generates a shield for 15% of your max health. Removes all debuffs.

NAME: Decaying Breath
DESCRIPTION: Inflicts a moderate amount of ice magical damage and lowers enemy's physical and magical attack.

NAME: Bolt Shock
DESCRIPTION: Deals a moderate amount of lightning physical damage.

NAME: Leaf Shield
DESCRIPTION: Raise your physical and magical defense and get a shield for 20% of your max health.

NAME: Wind Arrow
DESCRIPTION: Deal moderate physical wind damage to an enemy.

NAME: Blinding Shot
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical holy damage to an enemy and lower their physical and magical attack.

NAME: Weakening Sting
DESCRIPTION: Deal a moderate amount of wind physical damage and lower the enemy's physical and magical attack.

NAME: Flammable Acid
DESCRIPTION: Deal a moderate amount of fire magical damage and lower the enemy's physical and magical defense.

NAME: Feast on the Weak
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical dark damage to an enemy and heal for the damage done. This skill deals more damage as more debuffs the target has.

NAME: Steal HP
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical dark damage to an enemy and heal for the damage done.

NAME: Fragmentation Explosion
DESCRIPTION: Deal magical fire damage to an enemy and lower their defenses.

NAME: Smoke Bomb
DESCRIPTION: Deal a moderate amount of wind physical damage and lower the enemy's physical and magical attack.
